metadata.title: CVE-2015-2666 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Stack-based buffer overflow in the get_matching_model_microcode function inarch/x86/kernel/cpu/microcode/intel_early.c in the Linux kernel before 4.0allows context-dependent attackers to gain privileges by constructing acrafted microcode header and leveraging root privileges for write access tothe initrd.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2666` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-51-generic - 3.13.0-51.84
linux-image-3.13.0-51-generic-lpae - 3.13.0-51.84
